name: Hannan Authorize.net AIM – WooCommerce Gateway
author: ABD HANNAN, bungloon

sections.description:
this is a secured payment gateway using authorized.net AIM for your woocommerce
Authorize.net AIM integrates with Authorize.net payment services to provide secure and powerful payment processing for your WooCommerce store. Accept credit cards and optionally accept eChecks on your WooCommerce store via Authorize.net!

sections.installation:
This is how to install and configure

  1. Upload Hannan Hannan Authorize.net AIM WooCommerce payment Gateway.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to > woocommerce > checkout > Hannan Authorize.net AIM WooCommerce payment Gateway
  4. and happy configured its

short_description: Take credit card payments direct on your checkout using the Authorize.net (AIM) payment gateway for WooCommerce.
